description: Returns information about a specific database in Amazon Lightsail.

parameters.name: relationalDatabaseName
parameters.description: The name of the database that you are looking up.

nested_items.name: relationalDatabase
nested_items.description: An object describing the specified database.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The unique name of the database resource in Lightsail.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the database.

nested_items.name: supportCode
nested_items.description: The support code for the database. Include this code in your email to support when you have questions about a database in Lightsail. This code enables our support team to look up your Lightsail information more easily.

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: The timestamp when the database was created. Formatted in Unix time.

nested_items.name: availabilityZone
nested_items.description: The Availability Zone. Follows the format us-east-2a (case-sensitive).

nested_items.name: regionName
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services Region name.

nested_items.name: resourceType
nested_items.description: The Lightsail resource type for the database (for example, RelationalDatabase).

nested_items.name: tags
nested_items.description: The tag keys and optional values for the resource. For more information about tags in Lightsail, see the Amazon Lightsail Developer Guide.

nested_items.name: key
nested_items.description: The key of the tag.

nested_items.name: value
nested_items.description: The value of the tag.

nested_items.name: relationalDatabaseBlueprintId
nested_items.description: The blueprint ID for the database. A blueprint describes the major engine version of a database.

nested_items.name: relationalDatabaseBundleId
nested_items.description: The bundle ID for the database. A bundle describes the performance specifications for your database.

nested_items.name: masterDatabaseName
nested_items.description: The name of the master database created when the Lightsail database resource is created.

nested_items.name: cpuCount
nested_items.description: The number of vCPUs for the database.

nested_items.name: diskSizeInGb
nested_items.description: The size of the disk for the database.

nested_items.name: ramSizeInGb
nested_items.description: The amount of RAM in GB for the database.

nested_items.name: state
nested_items.description: Describes the current state of the database.

nested_items.name: secondaryAvailabilityZone
nested_items.description: Describes the secondary Availability Zone of a high availability database.

nested_items.name: backupRetentionEnabled
nested_items.description: A Boolean value indicating whether automated backup retention is enabled for the database.

nested_items.name: pendingModifiedValues
nested_items.description: Describes pending database value modifications.

nested_items.name: masterUserPassword
nested_items.description: The password for the master user of the database.

nested_items.name: engineVersion
nested_items.description: The database engine version.

nested_items.name: backupRetentionEnabled
nested_items.description: A Boolean value indicating whether automated backup retention is enabled.

nested_items.name: engine
nested_items.description: The database software (for example, MySQL).

nested_items.name: engineVersion
nested_items.description: The database engine version (for example, 5.7.23).

nested_items.name: latestRestorableTime
nested_items.description: The latest point in time to which the database can be restored. Formatted in Unix time.

nested_items.name: masterUsername
nested_items.description: The master user name of the database.

nested_items.name: parameterApplyStatus
nested_items.description: The status of parameter updates for the database.

nested_items.name: preferredBackupWindow
nested_items.description: The daily time range during which automated backups are created for the database (for example, 16:00-16:30).

nested_items.name: preferredMaintenanceWindow
nested_items.description: The weekly time range during which system maintenance can occur on the database.

nested_items.name: publiclyAccessible
nested_items.description: A Boolean value indicating whether the database is publicly accessible.

nested_items.name: masterEndpoint
nested_items.description: The master endpoint for the database.

nested_items.name: port
nested_items.description: Specifies the port that the database is listening on.

nested_items.name: address
nested_items.description: Specifies the DNS address of the database.

nested_items.name: pendingMaintenanceActions
nested_items.description: Describes the pending maintenance actions for the database.

nested_items.name: action
nested_items.description: The type of pending database maintenance action.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: Additional detail about the pending database maintenance action.

nested_items.name: currentApplyDate
nested_items.description: The effective date of the pending database maintenance action.

nested_items.name: caCertificateIdentifier
nested_items.description: The certificate associated with the database.
